ContactID.description: The unique identifier for the contact

AccountNumber.description: The unique identifier for the contact's account number

EmailAddress.description: Primary email address of the contact

BankAccountDetails.description: Details of bank account linked to the contact

TaxNumber.description: Tax number associated with the contact

AccountsReceivableTaxType.description: The tax type for accounts receivable transactions

AccountsPayableTaxType.description: The tax type for accounts payable transactions

Addresses.description: List of addresses associated with the contact

Phones.description: List of phone numbers for the contact

IsSupplier.description: Flag indicating if the contact is a supplier

IsCustomer.description: Flag indicating if the contact is a customer

DefaultCurrency.description: Default currency used for transactions with the contact

UpdatedDateUTC.description: Date and time when the contact was last updated

ContactPersons.description: List of persons associated with the contact

FirstName.description: First name of the contact person

LastName.description: Last name of the contact person

EmailAddress.description: Email address of the contact person

IncludeInEmails.description: Flag indicating whether to include the contact person in emails

XeroNetworkKey.description: Unique identifier for the network key in Xero

SalesDefaultAccountCode.description: Default account code for sales related to the contact

PurchasesDefaultAccountCode.description: Default account code for purchases related to the contact

SalesTrackingCategories.description: Tracking categories associated with sales for the contact

PurchasesTrackingCategories.description: Tracking categories associated with purchases for the contact

TrackingCategoryOption.description: Option selected for the tracking category

PaymentTerms.description: Payment terms applicable to the contact

ContactGroups.description: Groups to which the contact belongs

BrandingTheme.description: The branding theme associated with the contact

BatchPayments.description: Information about batch payments for the contact

Details.description: Additional details related to the batch payment

Reference.description: Reference information for the batch payment

Code.description: Code associated with the batch payment

BankAccountNumber.description: Account number of bank account for batch payments

BankAccountName.description: Name of bank account for batch payments

Discount.description: Discount information related to the contact

HasAttachments.description: Flag indicating if the contact has any attachments

Attachments.description: Any attachments related to the contact

HasValidationErrors.description: Flag indicating if there are validation errors for the contact

ValidationErrors.description: Validation errors, if any, related to the contact
